Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)


How do I create an account on your website?

To create an account, click the "Sign Up" or "Create Account" button on the homepage. Follow the prompts to enter your details and set a password.

How can I reset my password if I forget it?

If you forget your password, click the "Forgot Password" link on the login page. You will receive an email with instructions to reset your password.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and more. You can choose your preferred payment option during checkout.

{/* Add more FAQ items here */}
); } export default FAQ
